name: A Fear Of Heights, And Other Things
description: A collection of scenes for demonstrating VR presence to new users. Not a horror game, and has no jump scares.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 SP1 Processor: Intel Core i5 4590 or AMD FX 8350 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 or AMD Radeon R9 290 Storage: 900 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

reviews.review_text: This has become one of my primary go to experiences for introducing people to VR. These are great and everyone agrees that the Basejump, the 2nd time, is the best. (I've had a few people end up on the floor the first time through so now we are in a position to catch them the first time we put them through it :-) ).
